net.kuujo.vertigo.component

Interface Component<T extends Component<T>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Executor, Feeder, Worker

    public interface Component<T extends Component<T>>
    A network component.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T addHook(ComponentHook hook)
      Adds a hook to the component.
      T declareSchema(MessageSchema schema)
      Declares an input message schema for the component.
      org.vertx.java.platform.Container getContainer()
      Gets the component container instance.
      InstanceContext<T> getContext()
      Returns the component instance context.
      InputCollector getInput()
      Returns the component's InputCollector.
      OutputCollector getOutput()
      Returns the component's OutputCollector.
      org.vertx.java.core.Vertx getVertx()
      Gets the component Vertx instance.
      T start()
      Starts the component.
      T start(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> doneHandler)
      Starts the component.

    • Method Detail

      • getVertx

        org.vertx.java.core.Vertx getVertx()
        Gets the component Vertx instance.
        Returns:
        The component Vertx instance.

      • getContainer

        org.vertx.java.platform.Container getContainer()
        Gets the component container instance.
        Returns:
        The component container instance.

      • getInput

        InputCollector getInput()
        Returns the component's InputCollector. This is the element of the component which subscribes to and receives input from other components.
        Returns:
        The components InputCollector.

      • getOutput

        OutputCollector getOutput()
        Returns the component's OutputCollector. This is the element of the component which receives subscriptions and emits messages to other components.
        Returns:
        The component's OutputCollector.

      • getContext

        InstanceContext<T> getContext()
        Returns the component instance context. The instance context can be used to retrieve useful information about an entire network.
        Returns:
        The instance context.

      • addHook

        T addHook(ComponentHook hook)
        Adds a hook to the component.
        Parameters:
        hook - The hook to add.
        Returns:
        The called component instance.

      • declareSchema

        T declareSchema(MessageSchema schema)
        Declares an input message schema for the component. Any messages that fail to comply with the required component input schema will be automatically failed.
        Parameters:
        schema - The input schema required by the component.
        Returns:
        The called component instance.

      • start

        T start()
        Starts the component.
        Returns:
        The called component instance.

      • start

        T start(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> doneHandler)
        Starts the component.
        Parameters:
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be invoked once the component is started.
        Returns:
        The called component instance.
